verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Turn your ear to heaven and hear the noise inside
The sond of angel's awe, the sound of angel's song

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And all this for a King, we could join and sing
All to Christ our King

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh praise Him, oh, praise Him
He is holy, He is Holy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Turn your gaze to heaven and raise a joyous noise
The sound of salvation come, the sound of rescued ones

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
All this for a king, angels join to sing
All for Christ our King

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Alleluia, (4x)
Alleluia, alleluia, He is holy, He is holy
